DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial demonstrate bioequivalence newly develop fix dose combination ( FDC ) tablet contain linagliptin metformin extend release compare free combination linagliptin metformin extend release .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence FDC Tablet Linagliptin/Metformin ( 2.5mg/750mg ) Extended Release Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male female subject Exclusion criterion : Any relevant deviation healthy condition
